Article Name: Generics Must Compete On Price, Not Safety
Description: The FDA’s draft guidance sends the opposite message: that standards can be bent, and safety is negotiable.

Article Name: Why More People Without Diabetes Are Using Glucose Monitors
Description: Glucose monitors promise real-time insights into health, but data can be misleading without context. Here’s what to know before trying one.

Article Name: CDC Sends Termination Notices To 600 Employees, Including 100 Working In Violence Prevention
Description: The CDC sent termination notices to 600 employees, including 100 who prevent violence. This comes days after a fatal shooting at the CDC headquarters.

Article Name: When First-Year College Students Struggle With Separation Anxiety
Description: Though homesickness is expected among many incoming college students, more awareness is needed on the impact of adult separation anxiety and how to reduce these struggles

Article Name: Valley Fever Cases On Track To Surpass Record Levels In California
Description: Cases of Valley Fever, a potentially deadly fungal infection spread in contaminated soil, are already on track to top the past several years’ record-breaking numbers.

Article Name: InnovationRx: Phil Knight’s $2 Billion Cancer Gift
Description: In this week’s edition of InnovationRx, we look at Phil Knight’s big cancer gift, Medallion’s credentialing clearinghouse, a new treatment for fibromyalgia, and more.

Article Name: What Is Your Health Record Worth? The Unseen Economics Behind Your Medical Data
Description: Real world data that harnesses deidentified health records is a multi-billion-dollar industry. But what is the value of a medical record?

Article Name: Trump’s First Term Harmed Military Health. His Second Must Rebuild It
Description: If the Pentagon resumes its push to privatize the military health system, it will harm the health of our armed forces and diminish their battlefield performance.

Article Name: When The Brain Remembers Cold, The Body Burns Fat
Description: Cold is one of the oldest forces our bodies have had to reckon with. For mammals, surviving it depends on a delicate coordination between the brain and the body’s heat response systems.

Article Name: Weighted Vests Are Now A Fitness Trend. Here’s What You Need To Know
Description: You may have seen people wearing weighted vests while walking on hiking trails, treadmills or TikTok. Here are the potential benefits and what to consider.
